__e: Nothing at home except an empty fridge and an empty bed.
I should be able to come into your yard and come into your neighborhood, in your house, and take anything I want from your refrigerator, and maybe even have my way with your furniture.
Our refrigerator broke, and he was right there with a new one.
It hangs on our fridge, mocking me for not having a plan.
He was locked in the icebox with the left leg for six hours.
I needed the cooler to save my new friend because he needs to go home and he's really nice.
